pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Contains personal and professional papers, newspaper clippings, outlines for possible television series, memorabilia and other papers. Includes some material relating to Coxe's pulp character, Flashgun Casey, Crime Photographer, which later became a radio series, Casey, Crime Photographer.
